name: Flipside Fairytales: Sleeping Beauty
description:
Ezha is the black-sheep of the kingdom fairies. Upon the birth of the new princess, each fairy gives a trait gift, but perhaps Ezha is a bit too progressive. The new baby is a girl, after all...

A cute re-telling of Sleeping Beauty where you play Ezha, a non-binary feminist fairy in the kingdom.

  • Meet and bond with the other fairies: Shahina, Lehina, and Oyimahina.
  • Figure out what is behind the princess' deep sleep.
  • Try to save the princess!
